member.name: FILE_ID_TYPE
member.summary: Discriminator for the union in the structure.

member.name: FILE_ID_TYPE.FileIdType
member.summary: Use the FileId member of the union.

member.name: FILE_ID_TYPE.ObjectIdType
member.summary: Use the ObjectId member of the union.

summary.para: Use the ExtendedFileId member of the union.
Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008, Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2: This value is not supported before Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.

member.name: FILE_ID_TYPE.MaximumFileIdType
member.summary: This value is used for comparison only. All valid values are less than this value.
